Class ThreadedTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.rmit.agtgrp.apparate.gui.simviewer.model.timer.AEnvironTimer

  • public class ThreadedTimer
extends AEnvironTimer
    Wraps around a environment timer to have it run on another thread

    Sykout
